title: Understanding HLOOKUP
text: HLOOKUP is used when you need to search for a value in the top row of a table or array and return a value in the same column from a row you specify.

title: Table Orientation
text: Consider the orientation of your data table. Is it organized horizontally or vertically?

hintAnswer: when the table direction for a field of data is $$\frac{horizontal}{across}$$ the worksheet
title: Identify Table Direction
text: What is the direction of the table when using HLOOKUP?
choices: when the table direction for a field of data is $$\frac{horizontal}{across}$$ the worksheet
when the table direction is vertical
